title: Vitaliy Yermakov
text:
Vitaliy Mykhaylovych Yermakov (; born 7 June 1992) is a <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Metalist%201925%20Kharkiv">Metalist 1925 Kharkiv</a>.
Club career.
FC Desna Chernihiv.
He made his <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Desna%20Chernihiv">Desna Chernihiv</a> on 29 July 2018 in a game against <a href="FC%20Mariupol">FC Mariupol</a>.
He got again into the Quarterfinals of the <a href="Ukrainian%20Cup">Ukrainian Cup</a> in the season <a href="2019-20%20Ukrainian%20Cup">2019-20</a> for the third time in the history of the club.
In <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Premier League</a> in the season <a href="2019%E2%80%9320%20Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">2019–20</a>, with the club of <a href="Chernihiv">Chernihiv</a>, got the 4th place, through the play-offs for the Championship round table. On 26 February 2021 he scored his first goal with the team of <a href="FC%20Desna%20Chernihiv">Desna Chernihiv</a> against <a href="FC%20Inhulets%20Petrove">Inhulets Petrove</a> in <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a> at the <a href="Valeriy%20Lobanovskyi%20Dynamo%20Stadium">Valeriy Lobanovskyi Dynamo Stadium</a> ended 3-0 for Desna.
Metalist 1925 Kharkiv.
In summer 2021 he signed for <a href="FC%20Metalist%201925%20Kharkiv">Metalist 1925 Kharkiv</a> in <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>.
